text: The women's 1500 metres event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 19 and 21 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Viola Kibiwot ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Berhane Herpassa ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Olesya Syreva ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 1500 metres
